## FetcherRetryStrategy type

Represents an higher order observable for deciding a retry strategy for http calls. Used together with retryWhen operator.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type FetcherRetryStrategy = (obs: Observable<HttpErrorResponse>) => Observable<any>;
```
